chara.textHome:
Huh? You want me to play nice
in your little Magical Girl gang?
Sorry, but can you go look somewhere else?

I made my mind up to only use my magic
for myself, no matter what.

If we meet on the battlefield,
we'll see who's the best hunter...
Winner takes all.

Yo, I noticed somethin'.
You gain mastery by memorizin'
the music to a song,

so surprise, this even helps ya
train your brain.
Wanna try dancin' through a song?

Yep, feelin' great right now.
Gettin' some real results here!
Hey, this doesn't feel too bad...

Maybe I'll go on a little rampage
real quick now!

Nothin' gets on my nerves like seein'
some girl make a stupid wish like I did.

But...I did do the same,
so I can't just leave them alone.

I already made my wish,
so there's no helpin' it.

That's why I think it'd be nice if there was
a happy ending waitin' for the Magical Girls
who made wishes for other people too...
I'm in the same boat, after all.

Ugh, what took you so long?
I almost died of boredom waitin'.
Let's get goin' already!
But first... Did ya eat anything today?
If not, wanna have this?

So tired...
How're you so awake this
early in the mornin'?
Oh, make me some breakfast.
Wake me up when it's ready.
All right, it's lunch time! What to eat...
Japanese? Maybe Chinese? Curry?

I could always go with
some Korean barbecue...
Ugh, I can't decide!
You're comin' to the arcade with me for a bit.
No, don't laugh.
Games are good for sharpenin' your reflexes.
I like wanderin' around town at night.

It really brings it home that we're
all alone in this world, ya know?
If it isn't obvious, I'm jokin'...

I'm always ready to fight.
So, no matter what happens,
I'm sure I'll be all right...
Any time, any place, bring it on!

All right, while you're snoozin'
over there I'mma head out.

There are only so many Witches out there.
It's first come, first serve, after all!

Huh? You wanna fight me? 
Sounds like fun!

Let's do it! You better not hold back.
Come at me with all you've got!

It's tough bein' a Magical Girl
and keepin' up with school.
You gotta give up on havin' fun.

Everyone else my age is always
doin' tons of excitin' stuff.
Food is one of life's essentials.

But most people just forget that,
takin' everythin' they have for granted.

Fightin' is a battle of the brains.
Ya gotta have a strategy...

That's why I always eat lots of sweets, 
ya know, 'cause sugar revs my brain up.

Instead of just watchin' me play,
you should try one of these dance games.

Heh, it'd be fun to see
you strugglin' to keep up.

Those fancy cakes from bakeries...
We didn't get to eat those too often,
even when my dad was still alive.

Even still, they bring back
plenty of memories.
I'm gettin' kinda hungry...

Oh, that's right.
Sayaka mentioned a good
ramen place near the station.
Let's go check it out!
Madoka can be a bit ditzy sometimes,

but she's got the guts to
do what's necessary.
Guess you can't judge a book by its cover.

If I don't watch out for Sayaka,
she'll get into trouble for sure.
Who knows what'll happen to her if I don't?
It's pretty lonely...bein' by yourself.

I ain't gonna spoil ya and say, 
"All right, I'll stay with you."
Pick yourself up!
Ya gotta be strong!
Let's get this party started!
I'll take the win, thanks!
Well that went well!
Now then. What to eat?
They're gonna feel that one!
Name's Kyoko Sakura. Good to meet ya.

If you wanna fight alongside me, you better
be willin' to reward me with dinner...

Heh, I'm kiddin'.
Lunch'll do just fine!
Heh, this feels pretty good.
Let's keep it movin'!

Yeah! I guess from here on out it's
how to take the next step, right?
Everyone has a story.
This is mine.
Anythin' I do, I gotta master it completely.

So I gotta clear the toughest difficulty
with all perfects, ya know?
Huh?
I'm talkin' about dance games, duh.

I have to chase one note
after the next as they appear.

It loosens up my visual reflexes,
so it kinda helps me out during battles...
Yeah, I'm talkin' about dance games.
